# this file is modeled after https://svn.apache.org/viewvc/httpd/httpd/branches/2.2.x/docs/conf/mime.types?view=co
# MIME type (lowercased)			Extensions
# ============================================	==========
# https://sgillies.net/2014/05/22/the-geojson-media-type.html
application/vnd.geo+json	geojson
